amendment.description: Amendment provides $30 million within the DOJ's Juvenile Justice Missing and Exploited Children Programs account for Internet Crimes Against Children Task Forces.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to preserve $30 million for the Internet Crime Against Children program.

action.text: Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Wasserman Schultz.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wasserman Schultz amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
